title: Massteroid v1.0.2
description:
Tilt, tap or drag your way through space, collecting as much space junk as possible as you hurtle towards planet Earth. Become as huge as you can to inflict maximum damage!

Watch out for black holes and other hazards that threaten to reduce you as you plummet towards the planet below.
The people of Earth arenÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t giving up without a fight! As you get closer youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll have to dodge missiles, mines and other earthly defenses.

With the option of 3 different controls, you can customize your gaming experience to suit your play style. Play again and again to beat your high score or challenge your friends on Google Play!

Play through different gaming modes, including Gourmet Mode where youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re a giant space pizza, collecting delicious toppings for your hungry customer. Seriously!

ACHIEVE TOTAL PLANETARY ANNIHILATION
 
- Three different control styles: tilt, tap or drag. 
- Easy, medium and master difficulty settings. 
- Gourmet Mode: play as a giant space pizza! 
- Sudden Death Mode: survive as long as you can. 
- Endless Mode: play forever. 
- Achievements and leaderboards
